extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Portico Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Portico to determine if it is 3.0.7 or lower.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed Portico version 3.0.7 or lower?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Portico V3.0.8 or Higher
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the Portico software to version 3.0.8 or higher to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Protection Measures Against Unauthorized Access
extracted_playbook.description: Apply protection measures for network-compatible devices, solutions, and PC-based software to prevent unauthorized access. Refer to the application note for detailed information.
